wikipedia_page.main: Peter Howell-Jones (born 1962) is a British Anglican priest. He has been the Dean of Blackburn since his installation at Blackburn Cathedral on 25 March 2017. He was previously vice-dean and a residentiary canon of Chester Cathedral since 2011.

response: The incumbent dean is Peter Howell-Jones who was installed on 25 March 2017 after being announced in November 2016.
